mapper.insert: insert into inventory (inventory_id, part_id, warehouse, total_quantity, available_quantity, locked_quantity, last_in_date, last_out_date, stock_status, created_time, updated_time) values (#{inventoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{availableQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockedQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastInDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastOutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{stockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update inventory set part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_quantity = #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, available_quantity = #{availableQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked_quantity = #{lockedQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_in_date = #{lastInDate,jdbcType=DATE}, last_out_date = #{lastOutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, stock_status = #{stockStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where inventory_id = #{inventoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select inventory_id, part_id, warehouse, total_quantity, available_quantity, locked_quantity, last_in_date, last_out_date, stock_status, created_time, updated_time from inventory where inventory_id = #{inventoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
